p:
We determined the nontoxic concentration of CHP and CHL extracts with SH-SY5Y. Cells were seeded at 20,000 cells/well plates and incubated at 37 °C for 24 h. Cells were treated with various concentrations of extracts for 24 h. MTT (5 mg/mL) was added to each well (20 µL/well) and incubated for 4 h. Media was removed carefully. In this step, a formazan product was formed and dissolved with 150 µl of 100% DMSO. A supernatant was collected and transferred to a new 96-well plate. Moreover, it measured the absorbance with a spectrometer at 550 nm. The nontoxic concentration of the extracts was shown as the percentage of cell viability calculated by the following formula.
%
